00091 //----------------------------------------------------------
00092 void
00093 GrUberPatchSet::SetWorldXForm( const MMat4x4& worldXForm, const MMat3x3& worldNormalRot,
00094                                                            const MMat4x4& invWorldXForm )
00095 {
00097         _invWorldXForm = invWorldXForm;
00098 
00100         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _patchCount; ++i )
00101         {
00102                 _worldBounds[ i ] = MAABox( MOBox( worldXForm, _localBounds[ i ] ) );
00103                 _worldPlanes[ i ] = _localPlanes[ i ].Transform( worldXForm, worldNormalRot );
00104                 _worldToTextureMatrices[ i ] = _localToTextureMatrices[ i ] * _invWorldXForm;
00105         }
00106 }

00108 //----------------------------------------------------------
00109 void
00110 GrUberPatchSet::CacheTiles( const GrCamera* camera, unsigned int screenWidth, unsigned int screenHeight )
00111 {
00113         const float kBias = 2.0f;
00114 
00118         MVec3 lookDir = camera->GetLookDir();
00119         const MVec3& cameraPos = camera->GetPos();
00120         const MMat4x4& localToProjMat = camera->GetViewProjMatrix();
00121 
00123         float minWidth = 1.0f / screenWidth;
00124         float minHeight = 1.0f / screenHeight;
00125 
00127         float fov = camera->GetProj().GetFOV();
00128         float fovScale = 1.0f / Tan( fov );
00129 
00130         static bool printStats = false;
00131         if ( printStats )
00132                 PrintF( "Printing ubertexture tile stats...\n" );
00133 
00134         if ( r_DrawUberPatchAABBs )
00135                 gGrRenderUtil->SetupColoredRender( *camera, true, false );
00136 
00138         MVec3 corners[ 8 ];
00139         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _patchCount; ++i )
00140         {
00142                 if ( _worldPlanes[ i ].GetNormal().Dot( lookDir ) > PATCH_BACKFACE_ANGLE_COS )
00143                         continue;
00144 
00147                 if ( !camera->GetFrustum().IsAABoxInside( _worldBounds[ i ] ) )
00148                         continue;
00149 
00151                 unsigned int texelWidth = ( _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileX - _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileX + 1 ) * GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE;
00152                 unsigned int texelHeight = ( _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileY - _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileY + 1 ) * GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE;
00153 
00156                 float widthInPels = ( float )( int )texelWidth;
00157                 float heightInPels = ( float )( int )texelHeight;
00158                 if ( !_worldBounds[ i ].IsInside( cameraPos ) )
00159                 {
00162                         _localBounds[ i ].GetCorners( corners );
00163                         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; ++j )
00164                                 localToProjMat.TransformCoordFast( corners[ j ] );
00165 
00167                         MVec3 boundsMin = corners[ 0 ];
00168                         MVec3 boundsMax = corners[ 0 ];
00169                         for ( unsigned int j = 1; j < 8; ++j )
00170                         {
00171                                 boundsMin.AssignMin( corners[ j ] );
00172                                 boundsMax.AssignMax( corners[ j ] );
00173                         }
00174 
00176                         MVec3 size = boundsMax - boundsMin;
00177                         widthInPels = ( 0.5f * size.GetX() ) * screenWidth;
00178                         heightInPels = ( 0.5f * size.GetY() ) * screenHeight;
00179                         if ( widthInPels < minWidth || heightInPels < minHeight )
00180                                 continue;
00181                 }
00182 
00184                 if ( r_DrawUberPatchAABBs )
00185                         gGrRenderUtil->DrawColoredAABox( _worldBounds[ i ], GrColor( 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f ) );
00186 
00188                 float maxRatio = kBias * Max( texelWidth / widthInPels, texelHeight / heightInPels );
00189                 float lod = Log2( Max( maxRatio, 1.0f ) );
00190 
00193                 MVec3 tsCameraPos = cameraPos;
00194                 _worldToTextureMatrices[ i ].TransformCoordNoPerspFast( tsCameraPos );
00195                 int lodCenterX = ( int )tsCameraPos.GetX();
00196                 int lodCenterY = ( int )tsCameraPos.GetY();
00197 
00199                 int startSphere = ( int )lod;
00200                 for ( unsigned int j = startSphere; j < 7; ++j )
00201                 {
00204                         float radius = ( 1 << j ) * fovScale;
00205                         float dist = _worldBounds[ i ].Dist( cameraPos );
00206                         if ( dist < radius )
00207                         {
00209                                 int circleRadius = ( int )( _tilesPerMeter * Sqrt( Sqr( radius ) - Sqr( dist ) ) );
00210 
00213                                 circleRadius = Min( circleRadius, 8 << j );
00214 
00217                                 int minX = Max( lodCenterX - circleRadius, ( int )_patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileX );
00218                                 int minY = Max( lodCenterY - circleRadius, ( int )_patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileY );
00219                                 int maxX = Min( lodCenterX + circleRadius, ( int )_patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileX );
00220                                 int maxY = Min( lodCenterY + circleRadius, ( int )_patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileY );
00221 
00224                                 if ( minX > _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileX )
00225                                         continue;
00226                                 if ( minY > _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileY )
00227                                         continue;
00228                                 if ( maxX < _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileX )
00229                                         continue;
00230                                 if ( maxY < _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileY )
00231                                         continue;
00232 
00234                                 minX >>= j;
00235                                 minY >>= j;
00236                                 maxX >>= j;
00237                                 maxY >>= j;
00238 
00240                                 if ( printStats )
00241                                         PrintF( "Tile region (mip %d): %4d, %4d\n", j, maxX - minX, maxY - minY );
00242 
00244 //                              gGrUberDetailCache->CacheTiles( _patchTileInfo[ i ].uberTexId, j, minX, minY, maxX, maxY );
00245                         }
00246                 }
00247         }
00248 }

00250 //----------------------------------------------------------
00251 void
00252 GrUberPatchSet::Load( UReader& reader )
00253 {
00255         Clean();
00256 
00258         _patchCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00259 
00261         _tilesPerMeter = reader.ReadFloat();
00262 
00264         AllocArrays();
00265 
00267         _uberTextureCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00268         _uberTextures = new URef< GrUberTexture >[ _uberTextureCount ];
00269         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _uberTextureCount; ++i )
00270         {
00271                 UPath uberTexName = reader.ReadString();
00272                 _uberTextures[ i ] = gGrUberTextureMgr->GetUberTexture( uberTexName );
00273         }
00274 
00276         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _patchCount; ++i )
00277         {
00279                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].uberTexIndex = reader.ReadInt();
00280                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileX = reader.ReadShort();
00281                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileY = reader.ReadShort();
00282                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileX = reader.ReadShort();
00283                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileY = reader.ReadShort();
00284 
00286                 _localBounds[ i ].Load( reader );
00287                 _localPlanes[ i ].Load( reader );
00288                 _localToTextureMatrices[ i ].Load( reader );
00289         }
00290 
00292         SetWorldXForm( MMat4x4(), MMat3x3(), MMat4x4() );
00293 }

00295 //----------------------------------------------------------
00296 void
00297 GrUberPatchSet::Save( UWriter& writer )
00298 {
00300         writer.WriteUInt( _patchCount );
00301 
00303         writer.WriteFloat( _tilesPerMeter );
00304 
00306         writer.WriteUInt( _uberTextureCount );
00307         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _uberTextureCount; ++i )
00308                 writer.WriteString( _uberTextures[ i ]->GetName().GetPathString() );
00309 
00311         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _patchCount; ++i )
00312         {
00314                 writer.WriteShort( _patchTileInfo[ i ].uberTexIndex );
00315                 writer.WriteShort( _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileX );
00316                 writer.WriteShort( _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileY );
00317                 writer.WriteShort( _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileX );
00318                 writer.WriteShort( _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileY );
00319 
00321                 _localBounds[ i ].Save( writer );
00322                 _localPlanes[ i ].Save( writer );
00323                 _localToTextureMatrices[ i ].Save( writer );
00324         }
00325 }

00332 //----------------------------------------------------------
00333 void
00334 GrUberPatchSet::Build( GrPolygonUberPatchGroup* uberData, const GrPolygonUberUVMapper& uberMapper )
00335 {
00337         _patchCount = uberData->GetPatchCount();
00338 
00340         _tilesPerMeter = uberData->GetTexelsPerMeter() / GR_UBERTEX_TILE_SIZE;
00341 
00343         AllocArrays();
00344 
00346         _uberTextureCount = uberMapper.GetUberTextureCount();
00347         _uberTextures = new URef< GrUberTexture >[ _uberTextureCount ];
00348         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _uberTextureCount; ++i )
00349                 _uberTextures[ i ] = uberMapper.GetUberTexture( i );
00350 
00352         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _patchCount; ++i )
00353         {
00355                 GrPolygonUberPatch* curPatch = uberData->GetPatch( i );
00356 
00358                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].uberTexIndex = curPatch->GetUberTextureIndex();
00359                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileX = curPatch->GetUberTileX();
00360                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].startTileY = curPatch->GetUberTileY();
00361                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileX = curPatch->GetUberTileX() + curPatch->GetUberTileWidth();
00362                 _patchTileInfo[ i ].endTileY = curPatch->GetUberTileY() + curPatch->GetUberTileHeight();
00363 
00365                 _localBounds[ i ] = curPatch->GetAABox();
00366                 _localPlanes[ i ] = curPatch->GetSurfacePlane();
00367                 _localToTextureMatrices[ i ] = curPatch->GetLocalToUVMatrix();
00368         }
00369 }
00370 
00371 //----------------------------------------------------------
00372 void
00373 GrUberPatchSet::AllocArrays()
00374 {
00376         unsigned int arraySize = ( _patchCount + 3 ) & ~3;
00377 
00379         _localBounds = new MAABox[ arraySize ];
00380         _localPlanes = new MPlane[ arraySize ];
00381         _localToTextureMatrices = new MMat4x4[ arraySize ];
00382 
00384         _worldBounds = new MAABox[ arraySize ];
00385         _worldPlanes = new MPlane[ arraySize ];
00386         _worldToTextureMatrices = new MMat4x4[ arraySize ];
00387 
00389         _patchTileInfo = new SPatchTileInfo[ arraySize ];
00390 }
00391 
00392 //----------------------------------------------------------
00393 void
00394 GrUberPatchSet::Clean()
00395 {
00397         delete[] _localBounds;
00398         delete[] _localPlanes;
00399         delete[] _localToTextureMatrices;
00400 
00402         delete[] _worldBounds;
00403         delete[] _worldPlanes;
00404         delete[] _worldToTextureMatrices;
00405 
00407         delete[] _patchTileInfo;
00408 
00409         _localBounds = 0;
00410         _localPlanes = 0;
00411         _localToTextureMatrices = 0;
00412 
00413         _worldBounds = 0;
00414         _worldPlanes = 0;
00415         _worldToTextureMatrices = 0;
00416 }
